acl: Access Control List--if access is controlled, this field contains the dbGaP accession, e.g. phs000179
active_file_count: Total number of files for this case in the active (default) GDC archive
aliquot_barcode: Original TCGA aliquot barcode, e.g. TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
aliquot_gdc_id: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), e.g. 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844--this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
analysis_input_file_gdc_ids: GDC file UUIDs for input file(s)
analysis_workflow_link: Link to GDC workflow on github
associated_entities__case_gdc_id: GDC case uuid for associated case(s)
associated_entities__entity_gdc_id: GDC entity uuid for associated entity(ies)
associated_entities__entity_type: Associated entity type, e.g. aliquot or case
case_barcode: Submitter identifier, e.g. HCC1954, TCGA-ZX-AA5X, etc.
data_category: Category description of the underlying data, e.g. Clinical, Raw Sequencing Data, Simple Nucleotide Variation, Transcriptome Profiling, etc.
data_format: File format of the underlying data, e.g. BCR XML, BAM
data_type: Experimental source of the data type, e.g. Tissue slide image, RNA-Seq
dbName: Referring to the default/main database at the GDC; in this table, this field is always current
disease_code: A code representing the type of cancer, e.g. OV, GBM, LUAD; values can be found at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/TCGA-study-abbreviations
downstream_analyses__output_file_gdc_ids: Semicolon-separated list of GDC file UUIDs
downstream_analyses__workflow_link: Name of GDC workflow, e.g. VarScan2 Annotation (if applicable, NULL where no information is available)
downstream_analyses__workflow_type: Name of GDC workflow, e.g. VarScan2 Annotation (if applicable, NULL where no information is available)
experimental_strategy: Experimental strategy used to generate data (where applicable) e.g. WXS, RNA-Seq
file_gdc_id: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)--this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba4
file_id: GDC file identifier. This is a duplicate of file_gdc_id field found in some tables.
file_name: Name of file at the GDC
file_name_key: GDC path to original bam or vcf file
file_size: The size of the file measured in bytes
file_type: File type--e.g. aligned_reads, simple_somatic_mutation, gene_expression, etc.
file_submitter_id: Original submitter file id (e.g. CGHub analysis_id)
index_file_gdc_id: Where available, GDC file uuid for index file
index_file_id: BAM or VCF index file GDC file UUID
index_file_name: Where available, GDC file name for index file
index_file_name_key: GDC path to original vcf or bam index file
index_file_size: Where available, size of the index file in bytes
legacy_file_count: Total number of files for this case in the GDC legacy archive
platform: Platform used to generate this data, e.g. Illumina, Affymetrix SNP 6.10
primary_site: Anatomical site of the cancer under investigation or review
program_dbgap_accession_number: Program dbGaP accession number, e.g. phs000178
program_name: Program name, e.g. TCGA or TARGET
project_dbgap_accession_number: Program dbGaP accession number, e.g. phs000187
project_disease_type: The type of disease studied by the project, e.g. Sarcoma, Breast Invasive Carcinoma, Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, etc.
project_id: ID of the Project, e.g. TCGA-BRCA, TARGET-AML, etc.
project_name: Project Name; frequently the same as or similar to the project disease type, e.g. Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia - Phase II, Breast Invasive Carcinoma, etc.
project_short_name: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation, eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
sample_gdc_id: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), e.g. a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5--this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
sample_is_ffpe: Whether a sample is FFPE; either False, None, True, or null
sample_preservation_method: Sample Preservation Method, usually null or FFPE, also Snap Frozen or Frozen
sample_type: Two-digit sample_type code which forms part of the sample barcode eg. 01, 11, 06, etc.
sample_type_name: The longer name of the sample type, e.g. Primary Tumor, Recurrent Tumor, etc.
type: Description of the data, e.g. clinical_supplement, aligned_reads
